children.subject: For those who live in the US, it should be shipped on Aug 25 and should arrive in 3 business days.

Hi,
Can I know the estimated time of arrival for the kit? Since I’m going back to my home country I’m afraid that I won’t receive the package on time!
Try sending an email to the course staff. They can probably determine the status by searching your name/SID if you made the cutoff for the first wave.
I filled out the form after the 8/15 date. What are the chances that I can still get a lab kit for the class?

history.content:
Hey EECS 16B students,

If you are enrolled or waitlisted for EECS 16B for the upcoming Fall 2020 semester, you should have received a number of urgent emails from us over the last week asking you to fill out a lab kit form. Almost everyone has responded, but in case you haven't seen the emails, here is the information you need to know:

Labs are required for the course and will be fully remote. To make that happen, the department has been working hard to put together hardware kits with all of the lab supplies you will need.

Please fill out this form by 11:59 PM PDT TONIGHT (Saturday, 8/15/2020) to reserve your lab kit -- regardless of whether you are currently enrolled or waitlisted. You must use your Berkeley account to be able to access the form. (Please check your spam or promotions folder as well. If you are sure you did not receive an email, please let us know ASAP.)

PLEASE ONLY FILL THIS OUT IF YOU ARE ACTUALLY ENROLLED / WAITLISTED FOR EECS 16B.

Everyone taking EECS 16B must fill out the form -- a "no lab option" is NOT offered this fall. If you do not complete this form by Saturday, the shipment of your lab kit will be delayed. We will not provide extensions for students who receive their kits late as a result of not completing this form on time. Do note that if you are low on the waitlist, you may not receive a lab kit at first due to limited kit availability. However, we still need your information now so we can ship you a lab kit when one is available.

We will distribute kits out of Cory Hall to all students who can pick them up. If you are unable to pick up the kit in person, we will ship it to you. Please fill out the form as soon as possible before the deadline, and tell your friends in the class who may have missed or not received this.

Also, please make sure to double-check your information on the form, as you cannot edit your response after submitting. Again, you must be logged into your Berkeley account to fill out the form.

Best,
EECS 16B Staff
history.subject: EECS 16B Lab Kit Form DUE TONIGHT
